query:
UPDATE blog_posts 
SET content = REPLACE(
  REPLACE(
    REPLACE(content, '**Category:**', ''),
    '**Published:**', ''
  ),
  '---', ''
)
WHERE content LIKE '%**Category:**%' OR content LIKE '%**Published:**%'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4VGETmSGRFvHYrB.root --database WFL2GeYUk6Uk7UT2Y8LCmo --execute UPDATE blog_posts

    REPLACE(content, '**Category:**', ''),
    '**Published:**', ''
  ),
  '---', ''
